title: Workshop on Self-Regulated Learning Strategies for Online Learning Environments: Reflective Practice and Goal Setting

context.prior_knowledge: Applied Mathematics Experience in Vocational Settings and Basic Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: In smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, offline classes enhance self-regulated learning competencies to prepare for future transitions to online learning

learning_goals: Learners can systematically manage self-regulated learning by establishing weekly learning plans and maintaining reflective journals.
Learners can evaluate and adjust learning strategies using stage-specific reflective questions during project execution.
Learners can reset specific learning goals and develop action plans based on feedback from peers and instructors.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
